p: Methylamine solution (33 wt. % in ethanol), hydroiodic acid (57 wt. % in H 2O), lead (II) chloride (98%), ethanol (ACS reagent, 99.9%), diethyl ether and N, N-Dimethylformamide (DMF), Titanium di isopropoxide bis (acetylacetonate) (75 wt. % in isopropanol), Dyesol 18 NR Titania paste, fluorine-doped tin oxide plates (FTO) with surface resistivity ~10 Ω/sq, commercial carbon paste (solaronix), α-terpineol, and chlorobenzene (99.8%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich and used as received. Invasive plant Eichhornia crassipes were collected from the Coimbatore region, Tamilnadu, India for the preparation of porous graphitic carbon.
